name: looking into dna sequence 2
full_name: h1 Imitating Protein Synthesis h1 Protein Analysis h1 Amino Acid Composition h1 Finding the ORF
description: com sreshta140 looking into a dna sequenceReading the FASTA Imitating Protein SynthesisThe process by which DNA is copied to RNA is called transcription and that by which RNA is used to produce proteins is called translation. An ORF is a continuous stretch of codons that begins with a start codon and ends at a stop codon. RNA then leaves the nucleus and goes to a ribosome in the cytoplasm where translation occurs. Transcription takes place in the nucleus. png Total Number of ORF Strands This Python 3 environment comes with many helpful analytics libraries installed It is defined by the kaggle python Docker image https github. png Transcription Translation Number of Proteins Finding the Amino Acids from the Protein Structure. Cleaning the List of Proteins Remove chains smaller than 20 amino acids long Protein Analysis Considering the Amino Acid of the highest length for the Analysis Molecular Weight Aromaticity In chemistry aromaticity is a property of cyclic ring shaped planar flat structures with pi bonds in resonance those containing delocalized electrons that gives increased stability compared to other geometric or connective arrangements with the same set of atoms. An ATG codon within the ORF may indicate where translation starts. The concept is particularly important for zwitterionic molecules such as amino acids peptides and proteins. png attachment image. Aromatic rings are very stable and do not break apart easily. Organic compounds that are not aromatic are classified as aliphatic compounds they might be cyclic but only aromatic rings have enhanced stability. read_csv Input data files are available in the read only. png IsoElectric Point The isoelectric point pI is the pH value at which the molecule carries no electrical charge. com kaggle docker python For example here s several helpful packages to load linear algebra data processing CSV file I O e. This notebook is the continuation of the work https www. It uses DNA as a template to make an RNA molecule. Translation reads the genetic code in mRNA and makes a protein. input directory For example running this by clicking run or pressing Shift Enter will list all files under the input directory You can write up to 20GB to the current directory kaggle working that gets preserved as output when you create a version using Save Run All You can also write temporary files to kaggle temp but they won t be saved outside of the current session Protein Synthesis Identify all the Proteins chains of amino acids Remove chains smaller than 20 amino acids long protein of interest generate ORFs Conclusion This is how I got Started with BioPython Packages. png Amino Acid Composition Finding the ORFIn molecular genetics an open reading frame is the part of a reading frame that has the ability to be translated.
